snippet: Mr. Gold helped supervise the herculean task of combing through a secret 2.5 million-word Defense Department history of the Vietnam War.
abstract: Gerald Gold, an editor for The New York Times who helped supervise the publication of the Pentagon Papers, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gold helped supervise the herculean task of combing through a secret 2.5 million-word Defense Department history of the Vietnam War.

headline.seo: Gerald Gold, Times Editor on the Pentagon Papers, Is Dead at 85
headline.main: Gerald Gold, Editor on the Pentagon Papers, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Gerald Gold, 85, Editor on the Pentagon Papers
